descriptionHtml:
Hello all!
[b][u][color=#ff0000][size=2]Disclaimer: This was a save I just recently made. I utilized God mode and coc commands and /kill. I didn't want to go through the questline legit since it takes long and I wanted my character to be able to utilize showracemenu without having any problems with the stats of the character. [/size][/color]
[/u][/b]
So this save game came about from me wanting to play skyrim as Witcher 2 Triss Merigold. Now if youve played Witcher 2, triss is a powerful mage...so her being an archmage fits well. Now I wanted to play her as if Im progressing through a game with her as an archmage so In this save game youll find yourself as an imperial female at level 1. I tried to keep any experience from coming my way but I killed one or 2 people with destruction spells and I accidently read 1 alchemy book. Fortunately you dont have enough experience to level up so it is pretty much a  clean slate as an archmage. That meas SHOWRACEMENU should not have any problems >_<

Hopefully youll enjoy this save :)

[color=#ff0000]Required mods:
1. Alternate Start
http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/9557/?
2. race menu 
http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/29624/?
[/color]3. Apachii sky hair is needed if yo want the hair (the optional female hairs are needed as well)

Reccomended mods:
1. Showracemenu alternative (just in case you end up having some sort of problem with normal showracemenu)
http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/20394/?

All credits go to all the mod authors of the mods I used :)
PS if you want the face, I tweaked DrowofShadows123 preset, found here:
[url=[url=]http://www.nexusmods...im/mods/62960/?[/url]">Drow's Character Preset - Triss Merigold
[img]http://www.quickmeme.com/img/f1/f118b537695fff352a63fd2fa5e6ea41c1876f4386b79ee7402c31f6e1d0d0a7.jpg[/img]courtesy of http://www.quickmeme.com/
author: SNSDLOVER
